precaction: Remove any objects that you can knock off from the table.
instruction: Sit at a table with pink, blue, and yellow post-its.
With your left hand, place the pink post-it on the table to the left of you by about 10 inches.
Place the blue post-it in the middle.
Place the yellow post-its on the right side by about 10 inches.
Position your right hand on the blue post-it.
Move your hand across the body to touch the pink post-it.
Return your hand to the blue post-it.
Move your hand to the side to touch the yellow post-it.
Return your hand to the blue post-it.
Move your hand across the body to touch the pink post-it.
Return your hand to the blue post-it.
Move your hand to the side to touch the yellow post-it.
Return your hand to the blue post-it.
